title: help this account is stolen
body: I ONLY HAVE THIS ACCOUNT BECAUSE IT WAS STILL LOGGED INTO MY COMPUTER PLS HELP ME. THEY CHANGED MY EMAIL AND PASSWORD WHICH MEANS I CANT CHANGE MY EMAIL. IM SO FUCKING SCARED ANYONE HAVE ANY IDEAS THAT CAN HELP ME? AND IF SOMEONE SAYS THAT I WAS MESSING AROUND DONT LISTEN TO THEM

replies.body: Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you can if you ever need to recover **your** account. If this isn't your account, simply log out of it in the upper right hand corner.
